events.message: The insured reported a car collision involving their vehicle and submitted initial accident details.
The claim was categorized under auto accident due to the nature of the reported vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the claimant's case and facilitate further processing.
The claimant received official acknowledgment confirming receipt of the accident claim form.
Additional documents including photos of the damaged car and police report were requested for investigation.
The claimant submitted all requested documentation promptly including repair estimates and official reports.
The investigation process began to verify the details of the vehicle collision and assess liability.
Investigation concluded successfully confirming claimant's responsibility was limited and damages caused.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover vehicle repair costs following the assessment of damage.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely response and clarity of the proposed settlement.
Claim approval was granted based on the investigation outcome and submitted repair documentation.
The settlement amount was disbursed promptly to the claimant's designated bank account successfully.
After payment issuance and satisfaction confirmation, the auto accident claim was officially closed.
